clinical_study.brief_title: Termination of Persistent Atrial Fibrillation by Catheter Ablation
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective, Multicenter, Cohort Study of Termination of Persistent Atrial Fibrillation by Catheter Ablation

collaborator.agency: The Third Xiangya Hospital of Central South University
The First Affiliated Hospital of Dalian Medical University
The Third People's Hospital of Chengdu

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective, multicenter, cohort study aims to demonstrate the role of termination of AF in ablation for persistent atrial fibrillation, and evaluate the clinical outcomes in patients with or without AF termination.

primary_outcome.description: AF recurrence is defined as presence of documented AF episodes of 30 recurrence is defined as presence of documented AF episodes of 30 seconds or longer duration.
